name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in crafting high-performance solutions utilizing **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, **PostgreSQL**, **Angular**, and **NestJS**. Adept at implementing clean code principles and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) to ensure scalable and maintainable applications. Proven ability to leverage modern testing frameworks like **Jest** to deliver robust software alongside effective CI/CD practices. My background includes collaborating in team environments with techniques such as pair programming and active feedback loops to refine development processes.

I possess a strong foundation in full-stack development, highlighted by my proficiency in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have hands-on experience with cloud platforms such as **GCP**, and have successfully integrated AI/ML capabilities into enterprise-grade platforms. My approach emphasizes building secure and compliant applications adhering to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS while employing deep expertise in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
